regional_precipitation_variance.explanation: Percentage deviation from the 30-year rainfall average. High variance indicates unstable weather.

jet_stream_stability_index.explanation: Measures 'waviness' of the jet stream. Low stability locks in extreme weather patterns.

drought_severity_index.explanation: Percentage of land area experiencing moderate to extreme drought conditions.

air_quality_index_avg.explanation: Concentration of pollutants (PM2.5, NO2). Lower numbers indicate cleaner air.
